SELECT A.FID, COUNT(*) AS sell , SUM(B.FO_PRICE)+ SUM(B.FO_DONATION) AS price, ROUND( ((SUM(B.FO_PRICE)+ SUM(B.FO_DONATION)) / A.FGOAL) * 100) AS goal, ROUND(A.FENDDATE - SYSDATE) AS remain , A.FCATE , A.FNAME , A.FPRICE , A.FGOAL , A.FDATE , A.FSTARTDATE , A.FENDDATE , A.FIMG , A.FIMG1 , A.FIMG2 , A.FIMG3 , A.FIMG4 , A.FIMG5 , A.FDES , A.MID FROM FUNDING_PRODUCT A, FUNDING_ORDER B WHERE A.FID = B.FID AND FENDDATE > SYSDATE
AND A.FCATE = #{category}
GROUP BY A.FID, A.FNAME , A.FPRICE , A.FGOAL , A.FDATE , A.FSTARTDATE , A.FENDDATE , A.FCATE , A.FIMG , A.FIMG1 , A.FIMG2 , A.FIMG3 , A.FIMG4 , A.FIMG5 , A.FDES , A.MID
ORDER BY ${sort} DESC

SELECT A.FID, COUNT(*) AS sell , SUM(B.FO_PRICE)+ SUM(B.FO_DONATION) AS price, ROUND( ((SUM(B.FO_PRICE)+ SUM(B.FO_DONATION)) / A.FGOAL) * 100) AS goal, ROUND(A.FENDDATE - SYSDATE) AS remain , A.FCATE , A.FNAME , A.FPRICE , A.FGOAL , A.FDATE , A.FSTARTDATE , A.FENDDATE , A.FIMG , A.FIMG1 , A.FIMG2 , A.FIMG3 , A.FIMG4 , A.FIMG5 , A.FDES , A.MID FROM FUNDING_PRODUCT A, FUNDING_ORDER B WHERE A.FID = B.FID AND A.FID = #{fid} GROUP BY A.FID, A.FNAME , A.FPRICE , A.FGOAL , A.FDATE , A.FSTARTDATE , A.FENDDATE , A.FCATE , A.FIMG , A.FIMG1 , A.FIMG2 , A.FIMG3 , A.FIMG4 , A.FIMG5 , A.FDES , A.MID ORDER BY sell DESC
